document.full_text: india completed an epic journey beginning in dhaka 43 days ago and culminating in a six-wicket victory over sri lanka on saturday after they had appeared to be down and out in the world cup final.
document.title: india cricketers complete epic journey in exultant mumbai
lines_and_colors: india completed an epic journey beginning in dhaka 43 days ago and culminating in a six-wicket victory over sri lanka on saturday after they had appeared to be down and out in the world cup final.
